description: Designed for on-the-move individuals who prefer to carry only the minimum to keep in touch and informed, this sleek attaché is no bigger than needed, yet features eye-catching style and great protection for your netbook or iPad. Features: Holds an iPad or netbooks with up to 10.2-Inch screens; The front pocket expands via color-lined expansion slits to comfortably carry power cords and other accessories. The more you pack, the more color you see; The innovative strap system easily converts between shoulder and hand carrying options; Slimline design allows attaché to slip into a larger bag; Designated pouch keeps your USB easy to locate; 25 year guarantee. Fits Up to 10.2-Inch netbooks and iPad External Dimensions 11 x 8 x 2.5-Inch Laptop Compartment 10.75 x 7.5 x 1.5-Inch
title: Case Logic ULA-110 10.2-Inch Netbook/iPad Attache Green
